attributes.action: Reduce the UK spouse visa salary rule, £18600 to £15000
attributes.additional_details: Couples speak of pain over spouse visa rules - http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-35552289
attributes.background:
Like many UK subjects I have found love abroad but to bring my love home is made impossible for the low paid .
The UK is the only EU country to put this Levy on it's citizens. 
The salary must be paid for at least 6 months prior to application.
